imagetext:
Hello.  We are looking for highly intelligent individuals.  To find them, we have devised a test.
There is a message hidden in this image.
 Find it, and it will lead you on the road to finding us.  We look forward to meeting the few that will make it all the way through.
Good luck.
3301
observations: This was the very first message released by 3301.
Appended to the image are 61 bytes of ASCII data:\nTIBERIVS CLAVDIVS CAESAR says "lxxt>33m2mqkyv2gsq3q=w]O2ntk"
solve: Extract the ASCII data embedded in the image: tail -61c final.jpg
Caesar shift -4 to decipher URL to: http://i.imgur.com/m9sYK.jpg
Extract the steg'd data: outguess -r final.jpg outguess1.txt

imagetext:
WOOPS
Just decoys this way.
Looks like you can't guess how to get the message out.
observations: The words "out" and "guess" were a clue to return to the final.jpg and use outguess to retrieve the embedded steganography data.

textsample: Here is a book code.  To find the book, and more information, go to http://www.reddit.com/r/a2e7j6ic78h0j/
observations: This message describes a book code, the title of the book itself is not defined.
This message contains a link to a subreddit: http://www.reddit.com/r/a2e7j6ic78h0j/
